item.title: How can I make this print every other line?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[size=4]Solved[/size]

public void drawStats(Graphics g) {
      for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            g.drawString(frame.getPlayer().getSkillName(i) +" - "+frame.getPlayer().getLevel(i), 400, Misc.getSlot(i));
      }
      for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
         //g.drawString("Exp - "+frame.getPlayer().getExperience(i), 400, Misc.getSlot(i));
      }
}
